recipe.title: Dan Barber's Pork Belly
ingredients: 2 quarts rich chicken stock (water can be substituted)
instructions: Rub the pork belly with the dry cure and refrigerate for 3 days. On day 3, rinse the pork belly and place in a casserole pan as close to the size of the belly as possible. Preheat the oven to 200°F. Cover belly with rich chicken stock and cover pan. Place in oven and cook overnight, about 7 hours. Remove belly from braising liquid, drain, and cut into serving pieces. To serve, sear the fat side of the belly until crispy.
